casebody.data:
Israel GOODMAN and Aaron Goodman, Copartners, Doing Business under the Firm Name and Style of Goodman Bros., Appellees, v. UNION INDEMNITY COMPANY, Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 2, 1929. No. 33. Bernard J. Vincent, of New York City, for appellant. Prince & Loeb, of New York City (Sidney J. Loeb, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit, Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
